title: Prin&Appl-Engr Materials
description: The structure-property-processing-performance relationships of engineering materials are described. Materials selection is treated as a part of engineering design.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHEM 1310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 12X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1211K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1112 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
